name: Cyber Space
description:
Cyberspace is a 2 player retro game inspired by ICY tower.

Here the players' objective is survive as long as possible.

Player 1 play as link. By using the arrow keys, help link avoid the virus found along the system while also maneuvering to different platforms.

Player 2 play as the system. By using the mouse and it left click button, create platform for link to jump onto.
